original: ** Hey there! Welcome to ze_colors **
zh_trans: ** 嘿你好吗 欢迎来到ze_colors **

original: ** Believe it or not this map was once a tutorial and twice a duck! **
zh_trans: ** 无论你信不信，这张图是ze入门级别的！**

original: ** Level: Lemon **
zh_trans: ** 当前难度: 柠檬 **

original: ** This level looks like good old Louisiana: lines and squares all along the little lonely land **
zh_trans: ** 这个关卡看起来就像古老的路易斯安那州：沿着这片孤独的小土地布满了线条和正方形 **

original: ** GET GOING! Tension has been built in the spawn area! **
zh_trans: ** 快走! 出生点僵尸有推力! **

original: ** RESIST! We're pathetically close to the spawn still! **
zh_trans: ** 守住! 我们离出生点太近了! **

original: ** One tiny bit more! We're almost there! **
zh_trans: ** 再守一会！我们很快搞定！ **

original: ** Hold right here! There are 4 entrances - take care of them! **
zh_trans: ** 守住这里！这里有4个入口，守好他们！ **

original: ** Keep it up! 10 seconds left! **
** RESIST! We need to wait for a bit until we fly-fly-fly! **
zh_trans: ** 守住！守到我们飘起来！ **

original: ** Hold it a bit more! The magical energy is energy-ny-zing! **
zh_trans: ** 再守一会！魔法能量正在充能！ **

original: ** Last few seconds! HOLD IT! **
zh_trans: ** 最后几秒！守住！ **

original: ** Split hold! Both sides must survive! RESIST! **
zh_trans: ** 分头行动！两边都要守住！ **

original: ** Hold it! Last 10 seconds! **
zh_trans: ** 守住！最后10秒 **

original: ** Do you see it? Time to practice ropeless bungee jumping! **
zh_trans: ** 看到了吗！是时候开始练习无绳蹦极了 **

original: ** Narrow hold! Narrower time! RESIST A LITTLE OR DIE! **
zh_trans: ** 狭窄的空间！ 时间紧张！ 守住！要不然全都得死! **

original: ** Get moving! We lost time! MAP IS LONG ENOUGH NOW TO BE DECENT! **
zh_trans: ** 撤退！地图已经足够长了，可以说很不错了！ **

original: ** One more hold and then the woody poody finale! **
zh_trans: ** 再守一会！然后进入最后的守点! **

original: ** I'm quite sure you're wishing you had done something with your life now... **
zh_trans: ** 我非常确定你现在希望给你的生活做什么... **

original: ** THIS IS OUR LAST STAND! RESIST! **
zh_trans: ** 这是我们的最后一站！守住 **

original: ** GO! The absurdly stupid ending awaits with more absurd holding than ever! **
zh_trans: ** 走！比以往更荒谬的结局在等着你 **

original: ** THE BRIDGE WILL GO SOON! KEEP IT UP!!! **
zh_trans: ** 桥梁很快破碎！守住 **

original: ** GET READY! THE LAST WAVE IS INCOMING! **
zh_trans: ** 准备好！最后的冲击波要来了！ **

original: ** HOLD IT! WE MUST SURVIVE FOR THE LAST BIT! **
zh_trans: ** 守住！我们必须在最后一刻活下去！**

original: *** Amazing! You did it!! Let's see how you do on Grape mode! ***
zh_trans: *** 漂亮！你们做到了！现在难度更改为 葡萄 ***

original: ** Level: Grape 2 **
zh_trans: ** 难度：葡萄 **

original: ** Type mat_colorcorrection 0 to disable the redness... Oh! - nevermind **
zh_trans: ** 输入 mat_colorcorrection 0 关闭光污染... 啊，没事的 **

original: ** Level: Grape **
zh_trans: ** 关卡： 葡萄 **

original: ** Shake-shaka-shake-shaka-boom! Grape is a fruit with calcium! **
zh_trans: ** Shake-shaka-shake-shaka-boom！葡萄是一种含钙的水果！**

original: *** Incredible! You managed to clear Grape mode! How about another go? ***
zh_trans: *** 难以置信！你成功通关了葡萄模式 再来一次如何？***

original: *** Bet you didn't expect to see this message! Congratulations for beating Grape 2 mode! Do you dare to keep playing? ***
zh_trans: *** 我打赌你一定没想到会看到这条信息！恭喜您成功闯过葡萄 2 模式！你还敢继续玩吗？***

original: test
zh_trans: 测试
